    • start

      public static void start​(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane stackPane)
      Initializating the world and all the graphical objects.
      Parameters:
      stackPane - The parent pane on which initializing the world

    • putWorker

      public void putWorker​(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, java.lang.String color)
      Creates an object (worker) and position it on a certain position on the board. The worker generated is of a certain color (BLUE, ORANGE, PURPLE)
      Parameters:
      point - Where to put the worker
      color - the color of the worker

    • build

      public void build​(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, boolean dome)
      Build a block on a certain point in the billboard
      Parameters:
      point - where to build a block
      dome - build a dome, instead of a block

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(javafx.geometry.Point2D startPos, javafx.geometry.Point2D endPos)
      Move a worker from a position to another
      Parameters:
      startPos - starting position
      endPos - end position

    • swapWorkers

      public void swapWorkers​(javafx.geometry.Point2D startPos1, javafx.geometry.Point2D startPos2, javafx.geometry.Point2D endPos1, javafx.geometry.Point2D endPos2)
      Move two workers at the same time.
      Parameters:
      startPos1 - starting position of the 1st worker
      startPos2 - starting position of the 2nd worker
      endPos1 - ending position of the 1st worker
      endPos2 - ending position of the 2nd worker

    • removeWorker

      public void removeWorker​(javafx.geometry.Point2D pos)
      Remove the worker in a certain position from the billboard
      Parameters:
      pos - the position on which the worker is situated

    • endAnimation

      public void endAnimation()
      Start the animation of ending at the end of the game

    • showCells

      public void showCells​(java.util.Set<Position> positionSet)
      Show a yellow halo on every position of the set
      Parameters:
      positionSet - the set of the positions to glow

    • hideArrow

      public void hideArrow()
      Hide the arrow which indicates a certain worker selected

    • showArrow

      public void showArrow​(java.lang.String color, javafx.geometry.Point2D point2D)
      Shows an arrow on the selected worker
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the selected worker
      point2D - the position of the selected worker
